overview: "Che Copete" now plays "Ladilla Kid", who by mistake replaces a bloody assassin named "El Vengador". "El Vengador del Hoyo" is the first cowboy video-production that contains everything a great gunslingers film has: duels, fights, shootings, blood, and of course a whole lot of laughs.
tagline: The first Chilean cowboy's movie with "Che Copete" as "Ladilla Kid"
title: The Hole Avenger
